competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Top competitor with Planner, Project, Teams, SharePoint, Azure DevOps

competitors.name: GitHub
competitors.notes: Microsoft-owned source code platform, dominant in developer community

competitors.name: GitLab
competitors.notes: DevSecOps platform, best alternative for software developers

competitors.name: Asana
competitors.notes: User-friendly project management with strong integrations

competitors.name: monday.com
competitors.notes: Popular project management with easy-to-use features

context: As of 2024, Atlassian reported annual revenue of $4.36B. The company faces challenges: users complain about bloated UX, performance issues, and high costs. Microsoft remains the dominant threat.
